name: The Legend of Dark Witch: False Chronica(itch)
name_original: The Legend of Dark Witch: False Chronica(itch)
description:
This game is a fan game based on INSIDE SYSTEM's The Legend of Dark Witch.

Let's proceed while strengthening with power-up items obtained on the way!

I am very honored to have been introduced by the original author, INSIDE SYSTEM.

Note : Japanese only. No English, sorry.
